Text: Paris MeetingDear Kim Just wanted to thankyou for hosting the meeting at your home Thursday night The hospitality was great and I appreciated the opportunity to meet everyone If youd like to view the hotel the link is wwwsrsworldhotelscomfranceparishotelparrplhtml Thanks againsee you Feb Warmest regards Bonnie

Fw Feb Paris GirlsHi Kim Please send directions to me as Im the designated driver Im not at all familiar with Houston and we may be going to Judys and coming to your house with her Havent ironed out all the details yet but directions would probably be a good idea My email address is Look forward to meeting everyone Bonnie Original Message From To Sent Thursday January PM Subject Feb Paris Girls Hi Carey and Bonnie I just wanted to check in with you to see if you needed instructions to my house or would you be driving in with Judy If you need instructions just let me know Im looking forward to meeting both of you Thanks Kim BTW does Renee have her email set up yet
